info.name: Mondrian pong (308 chars)

renderpass.code:
// golfing https://shadertoy.com/view/Xdy3Wh ( 548 chars )
// reproducing http://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mafojfoHoJ1rvbw2yo1_400.gif

/*/ doesn't work on windows  (probable Angle bug at ?++)
#define v vec2//
#define mainImage(O,u)                                    \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,                              \
         L = .5 - mod( iTime / v(1,2), 2.),               \
         l = 1e2*  max( L++, -L ),                        \
         p = v(80, l.y*.7),                               \
       V[] = v[]( -p,p,l , L=v(15,45),L,v(15,12) );       \
    for( int i= -1 ;                                      \
         ++i < 4 && min(L.x,L.y) > 1.;                    \
         i==3 ? O++ : O                                   \
       )                                                  \
        l = V[3+i],                                       \
        max( L = abs( p = V[i] -1e2*( u+u-R)/R.y ) / l++, \
             L.y ).x < 1.                                 \
            ? O[i%2*2]++, i==2 ? O.ga++ : R               \
            : L = min( abs(p+l), abs(p-l) )              /*/





// --- 316 chars

#define B(i,n)                                 \
    l= V[3+i],                                 \
    L = abs( p = V[i]-U ) / l++,               \
    max(L.x,L.y) < 1. ? n++ , R                \
       : L = min( abs(p+l), abs(p-l) );        \
    if (min(L.x,L.y) > 1.) {                  //
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
	     U = 1e2* ( u+u - R ) / R.y,
         L = .5 - mod( iTime / vec2(1,2), 2.),
         l = 1e2*  max( L++, -L ),
         p = vec2(80, l.y*.7),
       V[] = vec2[](-p,p,l, L=vec2(15,45),L,vec2(15,12) );
    B( 0, O.r )
    B( 1, O.b )
    B( 2, O.rg )
    O++; }}}}/*





// --- 327 chars

#define B(i,n)                                 \
    l= V[3+i];                                 \
    L = abs( p = V[i]-U ) / l++;               \
    if (max(L.x,L.y) < 1.)  n++;               \
    else L = min( abs(p+l), abs(p-l) );        \
    if (min(L.x,L.y) > 1.) {                  //
#define mainImage(O,u)                         \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, L,                \
	     U = 1e2* (u+u-R)/R.y,                 \
         P = mod(iTime/vec2(1,2), 2.),         \
         l = 1e2* ( min(P,2.-P) - .5 ),        \
         p = vec2(-80,l.y*.7),                 \
       V[] = vec2[]( p,-p,l, R=vec2(15,45),R,vec2(15,12) );\
    B( 0, O.r )                                \
    B( 1, O.b )                                \
    B( 2, O.rg )                               \
    O++; }}}                                  /*





// --- 340 chars

//#define I(n) if (min(L.x,L.y)<1.) { O.n++; return; }
#define B(i,n)                                 \
    l= V[3+i];                                 \
    L = abs( p = V[i]-U ) / l++;               \
    if (max(L.x,L.y) < 1.)  O.n++;             \
    else L = min( abs(p+l), abs(p-l) );        \
    if (min(L.x,L.y) < 1.) return;
        
void mainImage( out vec4 O,  vec2 u ) {
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, L,
	     U = 1e2* (u+u-R)/R.y,
         P = mod(iTime/vec2(1,2), 2.),
         l = 1e2* ( min(P,2.-P) - .5 ),
         p = vec2(-80,l.y*.7),
       V[] = vec2[]( p,-p,l, R=vec2(15,45),R,vec2(15,12) );
    B( 0, r )
    B( 1, b )
    B( 2, rg )
    O++;
}  /*


/**/
renderpass.name: Image
